mapper.select: SELECT CONFIRMATION_NO confirmationNo, CONFIRMATION_NAME confirmationName FROM TB_QUALI_CONFIRMATION
SELECT QUALIFICATION_NAME FROM TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION ORDER BY QUALIFICATION_NAME
mapper.sql: SELECT FIELD_NO fieldNo, FIELD_NAME fieldName FROM TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD
mapper.select: ORDER BY fieldName
WHERE FIELD_NAME = #{fieldSelect}
SELECT CATEGORY_NO categoryNo, RELEVANT_DEPARTMENT relevantDepartment FROM TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT ORDER BY relevantDepartment

SELECT CATEGORY_NO categoryNo, CATEGORY_NAME categoryName, FIELD_NAME FROM TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY JOIN TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD USING (FIELD_NO) WHERE FIELD_NAME = #{fieldSelect} ORDER BY categoryName

SELECT QUALIFICATION_NO qualificationNo, QUALIFICATION_NAME qualificationName, STATUS, REQUIRED_RANK requiredRank FROM TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} ORDER BY qualificationName

SELECT QUALIFICATION_NO qualificationNo, QUALIFICATION_NAME qualificationName, STATUS, REQUIRED_RANK requiredRank FROM TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} ORDER BY qualificationName

SELECT QUALIFICATION_NO, QUALIFICATION_NAME, STATUS, REQUIRED_RANK, TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO, RELEVANT_DEPARTMENT, TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT.QUALIFICATION_CODE, QUALIFICATION_TYPE FROM TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION JOIN TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT ON(TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO = TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION ON (TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION.QUALIFICATION_CODE = TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT.QUALIFICATION_CODE) WHERE QUALIFICATION_NAME = #{qualificationName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION (QUALIFICATION_NO, QUALIFICATION_NAME, REQUIRED_RANK, CATEGORY_NO) VALUES (SEQ_PRO_QUALI_NO.NEXTVAL, #{qualificationName}, 2, #{profesionalDept.categoryNo})
mapper.select: SELECT QUALIFICATION_NO, QUALIFICATION_NAME, STATUS, REQUIRED_RANK, TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION.QUALIFICATION_CODE, QUALIFICATION_TYPE, TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD.FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION JOIN TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY ON (TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO = TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD ON (TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD.FIELD_NO = TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY.FIELD_NO) JOIN TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION ON (TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION.QUALIFICATION_CODE = TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD.QUALIFICATION_CODE) WHERE QUALIFICATION_NAME = #{qualificationName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT (CATEGORY_NO, RELEVANT_DEPARTMENT, QUALIFICATION_CODE) VALUES (SEQ_QPD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{relevantDepartment}, #{typeQualification.qualificationCode})
mapper.select: SELECT FIELD_NO fieldNo, FIELD_NAME fieldName FROM TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD WHERE FIELD_NAME = #{fieldName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION (QUALIFICATION_NO, QUALIFICATION_NAME, REQUIRED_RANK, CATEGORY_NO) VALUES (SEQ_TECH_QUALI_NO.NEXTVAL, #{qualificationName}, 2, #{techCategory.categoryNo})
INSERT INTO TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY (CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, FIELD_NO) VALUES (SEQ_QTC_NO.NEXTVAL, #{categoryName}, #{technicalField.fieldNo})
INSERT INTO TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD (FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, QUALIFICATION_CODE) VALUES (SEQ_QTF_NO.NEXTVAL, #{fieldName}, #{typeQualification.qualificationCode})
mapper.select: SELECT QUALIFICATION_NO, QUALIFICATION_NAME, STATUS, REQUIRED_RANK, TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION.QUALIFICATION_CODE, QUALIFICATION_TYPE, TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD.FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION JOIN TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY ON (TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO = TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD ON (TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD.FIELD_NO = TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY.FIELD_NO) JOIN TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION ON (TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION.QUALIFICATION_CODE = TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD.QUALIFICATION_CODE)

SELECT QUALIFICATION_NO, QUALIFICATION_NAME, STATUS, REQUIRED_RANK, TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO, RELEVANT_DEPARTMENT, TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT.QUALIFICATION_CODE, QUALIFICATION_TYPE FROM TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION JOIN TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT ON(TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO = TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION ON (TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION.QUALIFICATION_CODE = TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT.QUALIFICATION_CODE) ORDER BY RELEVANT_DEPARTMENT, QUALIFICATION_NAME

SELECT QUALIFICATION_NO, QUALIFICATION_NAME, STATUS, REQUIRED_RANK, TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION.QUALIFICATION_CODE, QUALIFICATION_TYPE, TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD.FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION JOIN TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY ON (TB_TECHNICAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO = TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD ON (TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD.FIELD_NO = TB_QUALI_TECH_CATEGORY.FIELD_NO) JOIN TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION ON (TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION.QUALIFICATION_CODE = TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD.QUALIFICATION_CODE) WHERE QUALIFICATION_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searched} || '%' ORDER BY FIELD_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, QUALIFICATION_NAME

SELECT QUALIFICATION_NO, QUALIFICATION_NAME, STATUS, REQUIRED_RANK, TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO, RELEVANT_DEPARTMENT, TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT.QUALIFICATION_CODE, QUALIFICATION_TYPE FROM TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION JOIN TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT ON(TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION.CATEGORY_NO = TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION ON (TB_TYPE_QUALIFICATION.QUALIFICATION_CODE = TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT.QUALIFICATION_CODE) WHERE QUALIFICATION_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searched} || '%' ORDER BY RELEVANT_DEPARTMENT, QUALIFICATION_NAME
